error.message: Class Drupal\flow_player_field\Plugin\migrate\cckfield\FlowPlayerField extends deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\cckfield\CckFieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase instead.

Class Drupal\flow_player_field\Plugin\migrate\cckfield\FlowVideoField extends deprecated class Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\cckfield\CckFieldPluginBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.4.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\migrate_drupal\Plugin\migrate\field\FieldPluginBase instead.
Call to deprecated constant FILE_CREATE_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::CREATE_DIRECTORY.
Call to deprecated function file_prepare_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::prepareDirectory().
Call to deprecated function file_unmanaged_save_data(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::saveData().
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to flow_player_field.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
